resources.string:
This application allows you to track your food supplies in your fridge and in your pantry. With this app you will keep an eye on expiration dates of your products.
For your convenience you can add necessary items to your grocery list.

\tYou can add your fridge items here. For each product you can specify the expiration day and the total amount of the product in the fridge. \n \tExpiration status of the products will be provided: if the item has expired warning message will be printed. \n \tYou can copy/add any item from your fridge to the grocery list.

\t You can add your pantry items here. For each product you can specify the expiration day and the total amount of the product in your pantry. \n \tExpiration status of the products will be provided: if the item has expired warning message will be printed. \n \tYou can copy/add any item from your pantry to the grocery list.

\tYou can add your grocery items separately in the grocery list or you can copy them from the fridge or pantry. \n \tYou can check the item you have purchased - it will change the appearance of this item. \n \tYou can move the item from the shopping list to the fridge or pantry???
\tIn the settings you can modify the theme for the application - orange (default) and day/night.
